title: Ayaz extends felicitation to Ishaq Dar on his appointment as deputy PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, April 29 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Monday extended felicitation to Foreign Minister Senator Ishaq Dar on his appointment as Deputy Prime Minister.
In his felicitation message, the Speaker said that appointment of Senator Ishaq Dar as Deputy Prime Minister indicated the trust on his political sagaciousness and his seasoned leadership, said a news release.
He said that Ishaq Darâ€™s appointment as Deputy Prime Minister would lead Pakistan on a new path of progress and prosperity.
The Speaker also said that Ishaq Dar is a seasoned politician and renowned economist.
The Speaker expressed his confidence that Senator Ishaq Dar would utilize his potential to lead the country on the path of development and prosperity. He lauded his services for progress and development of the country.
